## IConfig interface

Base interface of a lint-ts-index configuration. It can be used to declare a partial configuration instead of directly using the [Config](./core.config.md) class which is more restrictive to declare values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [exclude?](./core.iconfig.exclude.md) | string\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional list of files or directories to exclude. |
|  [include?](./core.iconfig.include.md) | string\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional list of files or directories to include. |
